Somewhat OT, but I'm trying to find some information on the usage of  
RDDL [1] in the real world. Is anybody on this list using it? Anybody  
care to share an opinion on its usefulness and degree of actual  
deployment?

[1] http://www.rddl.org/

Thanks,
Stefan
